odoo.template: # Install runbot.docker_install_MailHog RUN wget https://github.com/mailhog/MailHog/releases/download/v1.0.0/MailHog_linux_amd64 \ && cp MailHog_linux_amd64 /bin/mailhog \ && chmod +x /bin/mailhog \ && echo "/bin/mailhog -ui-bind-addr '0.0.0.0:8071'& &>/dev/null" > /bin/mailhog8071 \ && chmod +x /bin/mailhog8071
